actions.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Gejdenson to the Young (AK) amendment (A001).
On agreeing to the Gejdenson amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.

description: Amendment to the Young (AK) substitute amendment (A001) sought to provide that in no event may oil be exported before the end of the period within which the President must make his national interest determination.
purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record that requires that in no event may oil be exported before the end of the period within which the President must make his national interest determination.
